meanings.definition: A group of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: The foursome of friends went on a picnic together.
meanings.sent2: The golf tournament had a competitive foursome playing.
meanings.sent3: The foursome of kittens played with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The foursome of trees stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful foursome of balloons floated in the sky.

meanings.definition: A game or match involving four players or teams.
meanings.sent1: The basketball game was a thrilling foursome between two strong teams.
meanings.sent2: The chess tournament had a challenging foursome competing for the title.
meanings.sent3: The foursome of ducks raced each other in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The foursome of cars zoomed down the track in a close race.
meanings.sent5: The foursome of musicians played a beautiful melody together.
